stimulusHtml: According to some scholars, which of the following were added to the moai on platform (ahu) figures at Rapa Nui to activate their protective function?
choicesHtml: White coral and obsidian eyes inserted into carved-out sockets
Incised scarification patterns with inlaid ivory placed on their backs
Fiber and cloth drapery attached to the neck and body
Sharp metal objects hammered into the torso
